title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: When a new image "image1.jpg" is imported into the layout again, the original image is still displayed and not updated.
EB: The system should update and display the newly imported image when it is imported again.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Import the new "image1.jpg" into the layout again.

Expected result:
- The new image should be displayed.
